pullrequest.title: Encode url path before downloading models

content.raw: It would be nice to add a unit test for this functionality. Maybe the parsing of the model URL could be moved to its own function that outputs a `ModelIdentifier` and `ServerConfig`? I think it would be easier to add a unit test for that type of function
content.html: It would be nice to add a unit test for this functionality. Maybe the parsing of the model URL could be moved to its own function that outputs a ModelIdentifier and ServerConfig? I think it would be easier to add a unit test for that type of function
